name: Laundry Service Website
description: Built this site for Classy Touch Laundry. It allows a customer to track laundry orders and for an admin to edit a customer or an order as well as alert customers when their order is ready to be collected. Took me quite a while to develop

name: Draughts/Checkers Game
description: Probably my favourite project. Built this app because I missed the game. wasn't sure i could even create it at the time, but pulled it off in record time

name: Budget Planner Web App
description: Built this application as a way to track my spending in school, because i was always going broke. Decided to extend it to measure yearly incomes and expenses

name: Portfolio Website
description: You're looking at it!. Built it in about 5-ish hours... I think I like it. Do you?

name: DiceGame
description: My first ever game. Not particularly impressive. But i'm still proud of it. It allows two users to take turns rolling a die. First to reach a specified number wins. But roll two 1s or 6s and well...

name: Recipe Generator
description: Built this application in order to practice and improve my skills with asynchronous Javascript, and getting data from an external API. It allows a user to search for recipes to prepare a certain dish using a 3rd party, limited API
